Connection.description: 🖇️ A bidirectional connection between two pieces of a design.

rotation.description: 🔄 The optional horizontal rotation in port direction between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.
rotation.title: Rotation

tilt.description: ↗️ The optional horizontal tilt perpendicular to the port direction (applied after rotation) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.
tilt.title: Tilt

gap.description: ↕️ The optional longitudinal gap (applied after rotation and tilt in port direction) between the connected and the connecting piece.
gap.title: Gap

shift.description: ↔️ The optional lateral shift (applied after rotation and tilt in the plane) between the connected and the connecting piece..
shift.title: Shift

x.description: ➡️ The optional offset in x direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
x.title: X

y.description: ⬆️ The optional offset in y direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
y.title: Y

connected.description: 🧲 The connected side of the connection.

connecting.description: 🧲 The connecting side of the connection.

Connection.title: Connection

PieceId.description: 🪪 The props to identify the piece within the parent design.
PieceId.title: PieceId

Piece.description: ⭕ A piece is a 3d-instance of a type in a design.
Piece.title: Piece

PortId.description: 🪪 The props to identify the port within the parent type.
PortId.title: PortId

Side.description: 🧱 A side of a piece in a connection.
Side.title: Side

TypeId.description: 🪪 The props to identify the type.

variant.description: 🔀 The optional variant of the type. No variant means the default variant.
variant.title: Variant

TypeId.title: TypeId

description: 🏙️ A design is a collection of pieces that are connected.

description.description: 💬 The optional human-readable description of the design.
description.title: Description
